ContactUs.head: We're here to listen and help
ContactUs.desc: Get in touch with us, and we'll respond within 24 hours.
ContactUs.q1: Q: What is the commission percentage for Students?
ContactUs.a1: A: 0%! We take zero commission from our Students!
ContactUs.q2: Q: What is the commission percentage for Tutors?
ContactUs.a2: A: Commissions start at 20%, and decrease as you teach more and accumulate hours of tutoring on our website! The exact scheme is:
ContactUs.q3: Can I receive a refund for cancelled classes?
ContactUs.a3: If a cancellation is done at least 24hours before the class start-time, you will receive a full 100% refund. Otherwise, no refunds will be given for classes cancelled less than 24 hours before the class start-time.
